top_comments.comment:
Thanks Grimoire Weiss for your support on Patreon! We couldn’t do this show without your support and the support of our other viewers. If you like the show and want to see it continue, head over  https://www.patreon.com/ChinaUncensored
https://chinauncensored.locals.com
Squid game is original it was based around the Japanese comic/anime call Kaiji which has a lot of the similar plots and themes and storyline...
it reminds me of that x files episode ''Hell money''.

comments_since_last_sample.body:
As a Korean. Chinese tradition really didnt help too much during the invasion of Korea in 1592-1598.
they were extremely useless and the Korean navy had to hold the Japanese off by themselves. 
if you ever heard of Yi Sun-sin you would know how much of a badass he is.
